snippet: The Regional Economic Development Council Awards, which gave out more than $2 billion in state funds, have been unfavorably compared to a game show.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo presides over fifth annual Regional Economic Development Council Awards, doling out hundreds of millions of dollars to 10 areas across state.
lead_paragraph: The Regional Economic Development Council Awards, which gave out more than $2 billion in state funds, have been unfavorably compared to a game show.

headline.main: Development Money, in Cuomo Era, Is Disbursed With Dazzle
